journey_p1: I started my journey with Vestige seeking not just financial independence, but a way to empower myself and those around me. Like many, I faced initial doubts and challenges. But I believed in the power of this platform.
journey_p2: Consistently using the world-class products and simply sharing my genuine experience with my neighbors and friends became my daily routine. It wasn't about selling; it was about sharing wellness.
journey_p3: Today, as a Silver Director, I look back with pride. This rank represents not just my success, but the success of my entire team who trusted me. If a simple person like me can achieve this, so can you.
name: Name
